name: Q-Solutions Studio
description:
Q-Solutions Studio is a Magento Certified Software House based in Poland (Europe), specializes in eCommerce technology and collaborates with international companies, especially the USA, Australia, United Kingdom and Japan.
We provide customized web and mobile solutions. Our main strength is the high quality of service, in particular, the quality of the code we create. No programming problem is too big feel us to solve.
Also, the biggest asset of our company is the team.  Highly skilled & certified with great experience and well trained. 
Our four service areas of focus:
E-commerce development (Magento1, Magento2)
B2B E-commerce solutions 
Web design
Support 24/7
If you want to say hello to us feel free to contact us:
email: office@qsolutionsstudio.com
